summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2514, for the improvement of 35th Avenue North, from East John Street to East Madison Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks, wooden curbs and gutters, under Ordinance No. 28761 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
